DOC.brief_summary: This prospective observational study . The investigator compare Erythropoietin ( Epo ) level , erythropoiesis , regulator erythropoiesis , bone image bone metabolism healthy volunteer live different altitude .
DOC.criteria: healthy men nonpregnant woman , age ≥1840 year ≥ 60 year live predefined area Known bone pathology include osteoporosis , know haematological disease , know renal disease , heart insufficiency , pulmonal disease pregnancy
